description:
Turn the native GNOME dash into a bottom panel.

 Settings: panel height, panel background opacity.

 There is no multi-monitor support.

 Very short code, very light extension: the dash object is the GNOME dash itself, so no new object is created.

 You can consider installing Panel Free extension (https://extensions.gnome.org/extension/6454/panel-free/) which allows to display only this bottom panel, the top panel is only shown in overview.
name: Bottom Dash Panel
